definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: A ping is equal to about 36 square feet.
This spoke would be equal to approximately 1050 Newton or 210 pounds force.
sentences.chinese: 這個講話將是約等於1050牛頓，210磅的力量。
